long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Callchain wallet for chrome browser extension. 

The only wallet you need to interact with Callchain System. The extension provide one wallet instance for Callchain user and Callchain app, no more wallet is needed in specified application, CallMask provide one extension.

CallMask enable Callchain developer to develop DAPP and interact with Callchain system. User can use CallMask to send transaction for Callchain DAPP, and receive result from Callchain DAPP.

The extension injects the Callchain API into user's website context for developer to interact with CallMask. The API document will be opened at CallMask Github wiki.
